basics.name: Xavier Guihot
basics.label: Scala Data Engineer
basics.summary: Scala data engineer with an aerospace background, mainly focusing on MongoDB, Akka, Spark, Python and data visualisation.

work.summary: Live streaming of sport data feeds for media and sport betting companies. Initially part of the Dice technology group for 9 months, the whole team has then moved within the IMG ARENA group (both groups being part of IMG)
highlights: Low-latency and highly reliable sport data collection and broadcasting via Scala/Akka-stream micro services

work.summary: Adthena is a fast growing start-up and the market leader in Competitive Intelligence for Search. By monitoring millions of search terms on a daily basis, Adthena helps digital marketers understand their paid and organic search landscape and improve campaign performance.
highlights: Development of Scala/Java Spark pipelines on AWS clusters
Java endpoints on top of SQL Amazon Redshift instances

work.summary:
Amadeus is a global distribution system providing search, pricing, booking, ticketing and other processing services in real-time to travel providers and travel agencies.
Part of a data mining team in charge of flight search engine analytics:
highlights: Scala Spark pipelines over billions of records on a 30TB-RAM Hadoop cluster
Customer choice modelling in order to improve and adapt displayed flight recommendations, resulting in verified conversion improvements
Transitioning workflows and pipelines for Amadeus' new Hadoop production cluster

work.summary:
Airbus is a multinational corporation that designs, manufactures, and sells civil and military aeronautical products worldwide.
During my final year internship, within the simulation department, I've had the opportunity to develop a workflow editor.
highlights: First full-stack development experience, getting through each step of the application development cycle

work.summary: TCP simulations with NS2 (network simulator) of large-scale experimental measurements on different cellular networks using different technologies (3G, 4G, TCP variants, ...).

education.summary:
ISAE: Graduate Institute of Space and Aeronautical Engineering.
French equivalent of a Master's Degree in Engineering.

Two-year university degree in mathematics and physics (DEUG).
Ranked 2 out of 307 in physics and 5 out of 307 in mathematics at the CCP DEUG entrance exam for engineering schools.
